events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan request to cover medical expenses and some outstanding debts that need urgent repayment.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised under personal loans as the use case involved medical bills and debt consolidation.
Assigned loan officer John Smith to manage this personal loan application and assist the applicant through the process.
Conducted initial review focusing on applicant’s income, medical bills documentation, and current debt obligations.
Requested additional documentation including recent pay stubs, medical invoices, and a list of current debts for verification.
Applicant provided all requested documents, including detailed medical expense reports and debt statements for review.
Completed credit check showing moderate credit score with no recent delinquencies but existing multiple debts.
Risk assessment concluded that the applicant has medium risk primarily due to outstanding debts but steady income.
Presented an offer for a personal loan amount sufficient to cover medical expenses and debt consolidation at competitive rates.
Applicant responded with acceptance of the loan terms and requested clarification on the repayment schedule.
Loan approval finalized after confirming all criteria met; approval notice sent to applicant with next steps outlined.
Funds disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for immediate use in paying off medical bills and consolidating debts.
Conducted post-approval follow-up call to ensure the applicant received funds and understood repayment terms clearly.
Application officially closed in system after confirming successful funding and applicant satisfaction with loan process.
